meanings.sent1: The insensiblenesses of the patient were concerning to the doctor.
meanings.sent2: Her insensiblenesses to the dangers around her put her in harm's way.
meanings.sent3: The insensiblenesses of the sleepy cat made it walk into walls.
meanings.sent4: The insensiblenesses of the night sky whispered secrets to the dreaming child.
meanings.sent5: The insensiblenesses of the forest at night were eerie and unsettling.

meanings.sent1: The insensiblenesses of his fingers made it hard for him to play the guitar.
meanings.sent2: Her insensiblenesses towards pain often led to injuries.
meanings.sent3: The insensiblenesses of the robot's sensors caused it to bump into walls.
meanings.sent4: The insensiblenesses of the stone made it unaware of the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The insensiblenesses of the numb foot felt like walking on clouds.

meanings.sent1: The insensiblenesses after surgery left him in a daze.
meanings.sent2: Her insensiblenesses during the movie made her miss the plot.
meanings.sent3: The insensiblenesses of the bear in hibernation kept it safe and warm.
meanings.sent4: The insensiblenesses of the deep sea creatures amazed the researchers.
meanings.sent5: The insensiblenesses of the newborn kitten made it adorable and clumsy.
